title: Radiant Diamond-Accented Gold Bangles (Kadiyam)
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Crafted with a durable Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Contemporary open-ended bangle design featuring a twisted, geometric pattern. Each bangle is delicately set with three clusters of sparkling CZ stones, adding a touch of modern elegance. The sleek design allows for easy wear and stacking with other bangles.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold and Brilliant White (CZ)
occasions: anniversary gifts. Perfect for adding a touch of sparkle to any outfit.
description: This sleek Kadiyam offers a contemporary twist on traditional Indian bangles. The durable 22K gold and sparkling CZs make it an excellent value. Crafted with Hyderabadi precision, it promises lasting beauty. Easy to wear and versatile enough for both casual and formal occasions.
